newsitem.title: UK: Japanese stocks in London trade quietly higher.
newsitem.headline: Japanese stocks in London trade quietly higher.

text.p: Trading in Japanese stocks in London was light on Tuesday following a further fall in the Nikkei Dow, dealers said.
"It's been very quiet although some blue-chip companies managed to finish a little higher," said one dealer.
By 1540 GMT, the Nikkei 50 index was up 0.77 to 1,654.57 despite the Nikkei Dow losing 153.62 points to 19,514.45 in Tokyo.
